elementalSpark:EarthShield.NAME: Earth Shield
elementalSpark:EarthShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL switches to Earth

elementalSpark:LightUp.NAME: Light up
elementalSpark:LightUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL switches to Fire

elementalSpark:Levitate.NAME: Levitate
elementalSpark:Levitate.DESCRIPTION: Draw a random card from your discard pile NL switches to Air

elementalSpark:FlowIn.NAME: Flow In
elementalSpark:FlowIn.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card from your draw pile NL switches to Water

elementalSpark:VolatileSpark.NAME: Volatile Spark
elementalSpark:VolatileSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Switch to an Element of your choice

elementalSpark:FireOfTheForge.NAME: Fire of the Forge
elementalSpark:FireOfTheForge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a Random card in your hand when entering Fire

elementalSpark:FinalFlame.NAME: The Final Flame
elementalSpark:FinalFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Exit element NL Prevent using Fire for 4 turns
